Introducing C


Hengfeng Wei

hfwei@nju.edu.cn

Sep. 21, 2021

What is C?


C is a computer programming language.


You communicate with computers via PLs.

What is C?


Programming is NOT about languages.


So programming is not about C.


You learn C to express YOUR IDEAS.

What is C?


What is C?


C is much easier to learn than any human languages.

Why C?


Why C?

  • Popular

Why C?

  • Simple

Why C?

  • 期中测试
  • 期末笔试
  • 期末机试 (30 分)
  • 编程练习 (70 分)
